resources.string: The instructions on how to use this app are as follows:

1) Swiping to the left enables the navigation list to appear

 2) The navigation list contains the exercise names

 3) To add in a new exercise, click the blue button with the '\+' image

 4) In the new layout that appears enter the exercise name, select the type of exercise and click the Done button to add a new exercise

 5) Once you click done, the exercise appears in the layout

 6) On clicking the exercise name, a new value can be added by clicking the blue button at the bottom of the screen 

 7) On clicking a value, the entries can be updated

 8) On clicking the delete icon button next to the date card, the exercise is deleted

 9) On clicking the '\+' icon to the right of the date a new value can be added

 10) Values can be individually deleted by long clicking on the value
No Data Provided: Go to Settings and enable at least one of the graph options
